uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique identifying for the discount entry

key.title: Key
key.description: Key for grouping or identifying charges for tax purposes.

i.title: Index
i.description: Line number inside the list of discounts (calculated).

ref.title: Reference
ref.description: Code to used to refer to the this charge

base.title: Base
base.description:
Base represents the value used as a base for percent calculations.
If not already provided, we'll take the invoices sum before
discounts.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage to apply to the invoice's Sum

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount to apply (calculated if percent present)

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes to apply to the charge

code.title: Reason Code
code.description: Code for why was this charge applied?

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Text description as to why the charge was applied

Charge.description: Charge represents a surchange applied to the complete document independent from the individual lines.

receiver.title: Receiver
receiver.description: The party who will receive delivery of the goods defined in the invoice and is not responsible for taxes.

date.title: Date
date.description: When the goods should be expected.

period.title: Period
period.description: Period of time in which to expect delivery if a specific date is not available.

Delivery.description: Delivery covers the details of the destination for the products described in the invoice body.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique identifying for the discount entry

i.title: Index
i.description: Line number inside the list of discounts (calculated)

ref.title: Reference
ref.description: Reference or ID for this Discount

base.title: Base
base.description:
Base represents the value used as a base for percent calculations.
If not already provided, we'll take the invoices sum.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage to apply to the invoice's Sum.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount to apply (calculated if percent present).

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes to apply to the discount

code.title: Reason Code
code.description: Code for the reason this discount applied

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Text description as to why the discount was applied

Discount.description: Discount represents an allowance applied to the complete document independent from the individual lines.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique ID copied from the source document.

series.title: Series
series.description: Series the reference document belongs to.

code.title: Code
code.description: Source document's code or other identifier.

DocumentReference.description: DocumentReference provides a link to a existing document.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique document ID. Not required, but always recommended in addition to the Code.

oneOf.title: Standard
oneOf.description: A regular commercial invoice document between a supplier and customer.

oneOf.title: Proforma
oneOf.description: For a clients validation before sending a final invoice.

oneOf.title: Corrective
oneOf.description: Corrected invoice that completely replaces the preceding document.

oneOf.title: Credit Note
oneOf.description: Reflects a refund either partial or complete of the preceding document.

oneOf.title: Debit Note
oneOf.description: An additional set of charges to be added to the preceding document.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of invoice document subject to the requirements of the local tax regime.

series.title: Series
series.description: Used as a prefix to group codes.

code.title: Code
code.description: Sequential code used to identify this invoice in tax declarations.

op_date.title: Operation Date
op_date.description: Date when the operation defined by the invoice became effective.

value_date.title: Value Date
value_date.description: When the taxes of this invoice become accountable, if none set, the issue date is used.

exchange_rates.title: Exchange Rates
exchange_rates.description: Exchange rates to be used when converting the invoices monetary values into other currencies.

preceding.title: Preceding Details
preceding.description:
Key information regarding previous invoices and potentially details as to why they
were corrected.

supplier.title: Supplier
supplier.description: The taxable entity supplying the goods or services.

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: Legal entity receiving the goods or services, may be empty in certain circumstances such as simplified invoices.

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: List of invoice lines representing each of the items sold to the customer.

discounts.title: Discounts
discounts.description: Discounts or allowances applied to the complete invoice

charges.title: Charges
charges.description: Charges or surcharges applied to the complete invoice

outlays.title: Outlays
outlays.description: Expenses paid for by the supplier but invoiced directly to the customer.

ordering.title: Ordering Details
ordering.description: Ordering details including document references and buyer or seller parties.

payment.title: Payment Details
payment.description: Information on when, how, and to whom the invoice should be paid.

delivery.title: Delivery Details
delivery.description: Specific details on delivery of the goods referenced in the invoice.

totals.title: Totals
totals.description: Summary of all the invoice totals, including taxes (calculated).

notes.title: Notes
notes.description:
Unstructured information that is relevant to the invoice, such as correction or additional
legal details.

complements.title: Complements
complements.description: Additional complementary objects that add relevant information to the invoice.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured data that doesn't fit into the body of the invoice.

Invoice.description: Invoice represents a payment claim for goods or services supplied under conditions agreed between the supplier and the customer.

item.title: Item
item.description: Details about what is being sold

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Result of quantity multiplied by the item's price (calculated)

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Map of taxes to be applied and used in the invoice totals

total.title: Total
total.description: Total line amount after applying discounts to the sum (calculated).

notes.title: Notes
notes.description:
Set of specific notes for this line that may be required for
clarification.

Line.description: Line is a single row in an invoice.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage if fixed amount not applied

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Fixed or resulting charge amount to apply (calculated if percent present).

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Text description as to why the charge was applied

LineCharge.description: LineCharge represents an amount added to the line, and will be applied before taxes.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percentage if fixed amount not applied

amount.title: Value
amount.description: Fixed discount amount to apply (calculated if percent present).

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Text description as to why the discount was applied

LineDiscount.description: LineDiscount represents an amount deducted from the line, and will be applied before taxes.

code.title: Code
code.description: Identifier assigned by the customer or buyer for internal routing purposes.

period.title: Period
period.description:
Period of time that the invoice document refers to often used in addition to the details
provided in the individual line items.

purchase.title: Purchase Order
purchase.description: Purchase order issued by the customer or buyer.

sale.title: Sales Order
sale.description: Sales order issued by the supplier or seller.

tender.title: Tender Advice
tender.description: Tender advice, the identification of the call for tender or lot the invoice relates to.

buyer.title: Buyer
buyer.description:
Party who is responsible for making the purchase, but is not responsible
for handling taxes.

seller.title: Seller
seller.description:
Party who is selling the goods but is not responsible for taxes like the
supplier.

Ordering.description: Ordering provides additional information about the ordering process including references to other documents and alternative parties involved in the order-to-delivery process.

i.title: Index
i.description: Outlay number index inside the invoice for ordering (calculated).

code.title: Code
code.description: Invoice number or other reference detail used to identify the outlay.

desc.title: Description
desc.description: Details on what the outlay was.

supplier.title: Supplier
supplier.description: Who was the supplier of the outlay

Outlay.description: Outlay represents a reimbursable expense that was paid for by the supplier and invoiced separately by the third party directly to the customer.

payee.title: Payer
payee.description: The party responsible for receiving payment of the invoice, if not the supplier.

advances.title: Advances
advances.description: Any amounts that have been paid in advance and should be deducted from the amount due.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: Details on how payment should be made.

Payment.description: Payment contains details as to how the invoice should be paid.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Preceding document's UUID if available can be useful for tracing.

issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: The issue date of the previous document.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Human readable description on why the preceding invoice is being replaced.

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Seals of approval from other organisations that may need to be listed.

correction_method.title: Correction Method
correction_method.description: Tax regime specific key reflecting the method used to correct the preceding invoice.

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: Tax regime specific keys reflecting what has been changed from the previous invoice.

period.title: Period
period.description: Tax period in which the previous invoice had an effect required by some tax regimes and formats.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured data that may be useful in specific regions

Preceding.description: Preceding allows for information to be provided about a previous invoice that this one will replace, subtract from, or add to.

prices_include.title: Prices Include
prices_include.description:
Category of the tax already included in the line item prices, especially
useful for B2C retailers with customers who prefer final prices inclusive of
tax.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Special tax tags that apply to this invoice according to local requirements.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Any additional data that may be required for processing, but should never
be relied upon by recipients.

Tax.description: Tax defines a summary of the taxes which may be applied to an invoice.

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Sum of all line item sums

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Sum of all document level discounts

charge.title: Charge
charge.description: Sum of all document level charges

tax_included.title: Tax Included
tax_included.description: If prices include tax, this is the total tax included in the price.

total.title: Total
total.description: Sum of all line sums minus the discounts, plus the charges, without tax.

taxes.title: Tax Totals
taxes.description: Summary of all the taxes included in the invoice.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Total amount of tax to apply to the invoice.

total_with_tax.title: Total with Tax
total_with_tax.description: Grand total after all taxes have been applied.

rounding.title: Rounding
rounding.description:
Rounding amount to apply to the invoice in case the total and payable
amounts don't quite match.

outlays.title: Outlay Totals
outlays.description: Total paid in outlays that need to be reimbursed

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total amount to be paid after applying taxes and outlays.

advance.title: Advance
advance.description: Total amount already paid in advance.

due.title: Due
due.description: How much actually needs to be paid now.

Totals.description: Totals contains the summaries of all calculations for the invoice.
